casebody.data:
Mina Christiana Haegmeyer, Respondent v. The Manhattan Railway Company, et al., Appellants. Decided March 3, 1891. Appeal from judgment entered upon the decision of a judge at the equity term. Davies & Rapallo, attorneys, and Julien T. Davies and Brainard Tolies of counsel, for appellants. James B. Ludlow, for respondent.

Before Sedgwick, Ch. J., Freedman and Ingraham, JJ.

Per Curiam.

The judgment should be affirmed, with costs.
